meanings.sent1: She loved to decorate her room with trinketry.
meanings.sent2: The shelves were filled with colorful trinketry.
meanings.sent3: The trinketry on the table sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of trinketry was like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The trinketry added a touch of charm to the room.

meanings.definition: The act of collecting or displaying trinkets.
meanings.sent1: Her trinketry hobby brought her joy.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the art of trinketry.
meanings.sent3: The trinketry enthusiast always had a new find to show.
meanings.sent4: Trinketry hunting became his favorite pastime.
meanings.sent5: The trinketry display at the fair was impressive.

meanings.sent1: The box was filled with a jumble of trinketry.
meanings.sent2: She inherited a collection of trinketry from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The trinketry spilled out of the drawer when she opened it.
meanings.sent4: The room was adorned with various trinketry.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors selling trinketry.
